thread.title: truly a good hotel
thread.title_full: truly a good hotel - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jean Paul S
title: truly a good hotel
text: I rarely write a review but need to it this time. I have been staying in this hotel the last 8 years mostly for business and pleasure. Very stylish and clean, good location and most importantly amazing staff. The hospitality is as good as the Ritz & Four Seasons. Particularly Agnes and Stephane who are mostly accomodating and caring to the guests.
